name: ProtoKeeb_Via_Layout
author: A-Tech Officials
notes:
An open-source macropad/numpad/MIDI device for custom mechanical keyboard prototyping/learning.
Designed to be build/assembled in both Sandwitch or 3D printed case options.
PCB is designed to support a Raspberry Pi Pico development board and it is used as the main keyboard controller.
Also, supports other RP2040 developement boards like Waveshare RP2040-Plus that has a similar footprint to a Raspberry Pi Pico.
Per key south facing WS2812B ARGB LEDs.
4x4 Switch Matrix.
Supports 1 rotary encoder.
